before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"1kj2v","text":"This protocol has two sections:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":31}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1l8o8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dnh12","text":"Section 1: ensuring your NCBI submission environment is established","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"22oiv","text":"Section 2: SARS-CoV-2 submission of assemblies or consensus sequences to GenBank.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9c396","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"o53d","text":"Associated protocols:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1bv0u","text":"SOP for populating the NCBI submission templates (e.g. source modifiers for GenBank)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":48}],"data":[]},{"key":"1a7dk","text":"NCBI submission to BioProject, SRA, and BioSample.  Also includes NCBI account set-up for new users (Step 1)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":49}],"data":[]},{"key":"2givs","text":"NCBI Data Curation protocol for making updates, corrections, or retractions to your data.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":27}],"data":[]},{"key":"5fp2u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"96smr","text":"Link to PHA4GE contextual data specification ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":44}],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":8,"length":36}],"data":[]},{"key":"2rmnn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"B4C063D7C06A11EAA8870A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://www.protocols.io/edit/sop-for-populating-ncbi-submission-templates-for-s-bsbpnamn"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"A97DA980C06B11EA81C661B8FEFD0D95","url":"https://www.protocols.io/edit/sars-cov-2-ncbi-submission-protocol-sra-biosample-bf7bjrin/guidelines"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"B4C06496C06A11EAA8870A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/ncbi-data-curation-protocol-bacaiase"}},"3":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"7153856DC13E11EA89E10A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://github.com/pha4ge/SARS-CoV-2-Contextual-Data-Specification"}}}}

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4o7vv","text":"This is a SARS-CoV-2 specific protocol that covers the steps needed to submit SARS-CoV-2 consensus sequence to GenBank.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":119}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a0ir9","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1anco","text":"If you need a pipeline for frequent or large volume submissions,  follow Step 1 in the SARS-CoV-2 NCBI submission protocol: SRA, BioSample, and BioProject to get your NCBI submission environment established, then contact gb-admin@ncbi.nlm.nih.gov to set up an account for submitting through the API. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":87,"length":68}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":87,"length":67},{"key":1,"offset":221,"length":25}],"data":{}},{"key":"c2jje","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ars3","text":"This protocol assumes (and requires) that the user has a BioProject and BioSamples(s) already registered.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"91dlk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6n0pv","text":"Complete in order::","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67k76","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aqquf","text":"1. Populate your templates first.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":3,"length":29}],"data":{}},{"key":"e28fe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4h4et","text":"2. SARS-CoV-2 NCBI submission protocol: SRA, BioSample, and BioProject ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":71}],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":3,"length":67}],"data":{}},{"key":"af011","text":"Step-by-step instructions for establishing a new NCBI laboratory submission account and for creating and linking a new BioProject to an existing umbrella effort.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5p0k5","text":"SARS-CoV-2 raw data submission to SRA (Sequence Read Archive) and metadata to BioSample.  Users can modify this protocol to just create a BioSample with no linked raw data. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7gnlb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cu26v","text":"3. SARS-CoV-2 NCBI consensus submission protocol: GenBank (included protocol)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":77}],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":3,"length":54}],"data":{}},{"key":"7l1pu","text":"     Required: established BioProject and BioSamples","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":5,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jrln","text":"Submit SARS-CoV-2 assemblies to NCBI GenBank, linking to existing BioProject, BioSamples, and raw data.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"792gm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c26sh","text":"Version history:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c3mm1","text":"V3: Direct links provided to download metadata templates (instead of hosting duplicate files). minor edits throughout the protocol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"B817A49D6D4B11EBA6880A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://www.protocols.io/edit/sars-cov-2-ncbi-submission-protocol-sra-biosample-bf7bjrin"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"B817A4FE6D4B11EBA6880A58A9FEAC2A","url":"mailto:gb-admin@ncbi.nlm.nih.gov"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"399F6EE0681311EC941F778765DAEB39","url":"https://www.protocols.io/edit/overview-of-ncbi-39-s-sars-cov-2-submission-proces-b2kkqcuw"}},"3":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"B817A5426D4B11EBA6880A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://www.protocols.io/edit/sars-cov-2-ncbi-submission-protocol-sra-biosample-br8ym9xw"}},"4":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"B817A5876D4B11EBA6880A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://www.protocols.io/edit/sars-cov-2-ncbi-consensus-submission-protocol-genb-b3bnqime/description"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ech72","text":"Populate the two GenBank templates. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":35}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eh8ga","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ca7mc","text":"Download the current templates in Step 4 Overview of NCBI's SARS-CoV-2 submission process and the metadata required. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":34,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":41,"length":74}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":74}],"data":{}},{"key":"3tlod","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6mjjs","text":"GenBank structured comment info (mapping/assembly methods)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2efr9","text":"GenBank Source Qualifiers","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3qler","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"edm3b","text":"Populate the metadata spreadsheets for each isolate you intend to submit (you can submit metadata for a single isolate, entire MiSeq run, or for a large collection of isolates you intend to submit in batch). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"91haa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9nvuf","text":"Save the source qualifier excel spreadsheet as a tab-delimited text file (.tsv) and ensure that the date field is formatted correctly (e.g. 2020-04-20) in the text file.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":84,"length":39},{"style":"bold","offset":124,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2kgu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5uttb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"D449B080680F11EC941F778765DAEB39","url":"https://www.protocols.io/edit/overview-of-ncbi-39-s-sars-cov-2-submission-proces-b2kkqcuw"}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fpa8q","text":"**Ensure that the BioProject and BioSample(s) were registered using the same NCBI user group. If you are not listed as an owner on the BioProject/BioSample(s) you will not be able to properly link the new assembly data to existing records (and you will get a validation error in the submission portal).","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

See Step 2.1 for guidance on formating your FASTA file.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":239,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":120,"length":51}],"data":[]},{"key":"2dkmt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"85no8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"366qo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"13l2o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9uiqa","text":"Click \"Choose File\" to browse and upload your .fasta file:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"83mjo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4ru2o","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"fv371","text":"Click \"Continue\" and respond to any validation issues.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"f81si","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2j8bl","text":"Common validation issues: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cgoh0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5qelg","text":"Ambiguous bases were trimmed warning. Ambiguous bases are non- A, T, G, or Cs. NCBI trims terminal Ns first at the 5' end, then looks to see if 50% of the first 10 bases are ambiguous and trim to last ambiguous. If more than 30% of the first 50 are ambiguous, we trim to the last ambiguous and then recheck the 5' end. If that is fine, we follow the same steps on the 3' end. This procedure is run again if we trimmed vector from an end. NCBI removes sequences that are greater than 50% ambiguous after the trimming. They also remove sequences with internal vector.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":38}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dcnns","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dng49","text":"String of NNNs: If your assembly contains strings of internal NNNs (from mapping to a reference genome), you will get a warning asking for you for more information:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"oisb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bf6ln","text":"Click \"A region of estimated length between the sequenced regions based on an alignment to similar sequences or genome\" if the NNNs were caused by the reference-based assembly. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1ksdu","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":23,"offset":133}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":13,"offset":112,"style":"bold"}],"key":"201nq","text":"Solve this by updating the ownership on previous submissions OR, if you haven't created a submission group, see Steps 1.2-1.3 in the SRA submission protocol to establish a new one for your laboratory, or to add your name to a group already established for your lab.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"guid":"37DFD4586BF111EB84BB0A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://www.protocols.io/edit/sars-cov-2-ncbi-submission-protocol-sra-biosample-bf7bjrin"},"mutability":"","type":"link"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ed5ec","text":"REFERENCES tab:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3jo6u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3bbc","text":"Sequence Authors: Enter names here from your NCBI submission user group (can be a sub-set of the names or the full submission group list).  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"elh67","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2c7pv","text":"Publication status: For routine surveillance submissions choose \"Unpublished\".","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"16aea","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a8l4n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8g6l1","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"a22to","text":"Click Continue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"A33630606BF111EB974CDB65AAA65AB4","height":295,"id":197685,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","original_name":"Screen Shot 2021-02-10 at 5.44.50 PM.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gbbz9yen.jpg","source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gbbx9yen.jpg","type":1,"webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gbby9yen.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gbbw9yen.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2epuq","text":"REVIEW \u0026 SUBMIT tab:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"erlhl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"du5aa","text":"Revew the submission and Genbank record preview, paying close attention to correct linkage of BioProject and BioSample, plus any other metadata submitted as source qualifiers (in the FEATURES-\u003esource section).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ar6st","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5el8c","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"b8hq6","text":"Click Submit when ready.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"8FDCCF806CB711EBAAF28540C83F81C7","height":447,"id":197689,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Screen Shot 2021-02-11 at 5.19.03 PM.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gbb59yen.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gbb39yen.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gbb49yen.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gbb29yen.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"24s3g","text":"GenBank accessions:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"g2vi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"darub","text":"The status of your submission will be updated once it is processed and can be tracked within the \"My Submissions\" tab: https://submit.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/subs/.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":119,"length":37}],"data":[]},{"key":"8ksu6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9nrkv","text":"GenBank accessions will be listed here, under \"GenBank: Processed\" and available for download in the AccessionReport.tsv file. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e80u4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"99tv1","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"d2ktn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"askfn","text":"Sequences with no annotation issues will be listed as Processed. Submissions with annotation discrepancies will be marked as Error and a Fix button will appear.  A report is emailed to you and listed on the submissions page with the detailed issues.  If the data is incorrect, click the Fix button and you will return to the sequences page of your submission to upload a corrected file.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":54,"length":11},{"style":"bold","offset":125,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"co9u8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"idp9","text":"If you have evidence that the discrepancy is due to a naturally occurring mutation, send an email to gb-admin@ncbi.nlm.nih.gov with the SUB number and evidence.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":101,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"64E3B53DB49711EA84120A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://submit.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/subs"}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"AD6342C0C2C911EA8096BF6F17C3CD7F","height":98.07272727272728,"id":197693,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"GanBankAccessions.png","placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gbb99yen.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gbb79yen.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gbb89yen.webp","webp_source":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/gbb69yen.webp","width":580}}}}
